recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of cooked chicken, shredded| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of bacon, cooked and crumbled| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of ranch dressing| Measurement; 120; Measure out 120 grams of sour cream| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of green onions, chopped| Quantity; 8; Prepare 8 flour tortillas| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of enchilada sauce| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; In a bowl, mix shredded chicken, bacon, ranch dressing, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and green onions| Untimed; None; Spoon the mixture onto each tortilla and roll them up| Untimed; None; Place the rolled tortillas seam-side down in a baking dish| Untimed; None; Pour enchilada sauce over the tortillas| Untimed; None; Sprinkle with additional cheddar cheese if desired| Timed; 1200; Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Bacon Ranch Chicken Enchiladas
